name: MyTickr
overview:
At MyTickr you can create a Website of different RSS-Feeds in a simple way.

You can add your own Google Addsense and earn money with your MyTickr-Site. You can also add Flickr-, Twitter-, del.ico.us-, YouTube- and many more Feeds to your site. Select Ajax-Refesh to refresh the Feeds all the time.

It’s your fantasy:

  • Create a your personal page of your activities at Flickr, Twitter, Photobucket, YouTube

  • Create a site with news about your city

  • Create one page including all RSS-Feeds of your site

  • Create a Ajax-Refreshing Twitter site of your Friends (Twitter API is sometimes very slow)
